scripts.release: bun build && bun --filter @rozoai/intent-common publish && bun --filter @rozoai/intent-pay release
scripts.clean:deps: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'build' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.clean:all: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'build' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && rm -f bun.lock
